about_the_game:
Ertugrul of Ulukayin™

• Survive the chaos of the medieval era and set out on a mysterious journey to become the hero of the innocent. Light the world with justice that is ruled by darkness, corruption, and bloody wars. Live the life like a true Turkish warrior in this semi open-world action adventure game.

The Fate of Humanity is Tied to the Key of the World…

• Set out on a mythic journey to illuminate the world ruled by darkness, corruption, and bloody wars with your light of justice.

• In the 13th century, among the boundaries of Ahlat, the Kayı Tribe was living a peacful life until the Mongols attacked under the command of Genghis Khan. Ertuğrul, bravely defends his people and the kayı tribe who find themselves tangled in a ring of fire. Join Ertugrul unveiling the fate of his vanished brother, along this misty path leading him to encounter a mysterious Order.

• Ertugrul realizes the threat is bigger than he has foreseen. With his trusty friends, Turgut and Meryem, Ertugrul dives face first into a dangerous adventure. He, soon figures out that the salvation of humanity resides in the Key of the World, which will stop all the darkness and corruption bleeding into the world. In his view, this "key" will be the bringer of justice but in the wrong hands it could cause ruination.

Be the hero for the hearts and minds that lost hope...

• Explore the steppe life and fighting spirit of Turks. On each chapter witness the evolving gameplay. Save people, defeat enemies, strengthen your Oba and yourself, be the leader your people deserves and stand against the evil. Set goodness free.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB or Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i7-12700 or Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060 or Radeon RX 6700 XT or Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
